title: Shrinking Circles
description: Ever shrinking circles with a for loop!

steps.hint: Définis the color to see through - **tape** `color null`
Let's draw 32 circles all at once - **tape** `for i in [ 0 .. 32 ]`
Awesome, now for the circles - inside the for loop **tape** `circle 10 * i`

completion_text: Great! For loops let us repeat bits of code (it saves on all the typing)!
